alert.note: Alert for Bosque; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 04 at 8:57PM CDT until May 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON...WEST CENTRAL MCLENNAN...NORTHERN CORYELL AND SOUTHEASTERN BOSQUE COUNTIES... At 856 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Cranfills Gap, or 15 miles east of Hamilton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gatesville, Clifton, Valley Mills, Crawford, Norse, Osage, Hurst Springs, Pancake, Cayote, Coryell City, Whiteway, Aleman, Levita, Jonesboro, Ireland, Mosheim and Turnersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
